title: Greenview Corporate Tower:
desc: Equipped with a vertical garden facade and solar panels, this building reduces urban heat and generates 20% of its electricity from renewable sources.

title: EcoLife Apartments:
desc: Features smart energy meters, rainwater harvesting systems, and triple-pane windows, cutting energy usage by 30% compared to standard buildings.

title: Blue Horizon Shopping Center:
desc: Utilizes geothermal heating and cooling, LED lighting, and a waste composting system, achieving net-zero carbon emissions annually.

title: Sustainable Edge Campus:
desc: Powered entirely by wind turbines and solar arrays, this campus incorporates water recycling systems and green roofs to support local biodiversity.

title: Oceanview Hotel:
desc: Implements seawater cooling, motion-sensor lights, and plastic-free operations, reducing its carbon footprint by 40% while enhancing guest experience.
